Articles.Content:
I've linked a full MM config to make JNSQ compatible with Real Antennas.  It's still a bit buggy as you do have to go into the antenna debug menu in the PAW and find a site that works.  If anyone knows more about why this is, please share! 

 

https://github.com/dgxt002/JNSQ_RealAntennas.git
Moved to KSP1 mod releases.   Some discussion not relating to the confit have been removed.    If a thread is posted in the wrong spot, report it, don’t complain or harass the poster.
